hero_subtitle: Tuen Mun District Women's Association - Explore Our Exciting Courses

about_us_title2: Serving the Community · Caring for Neighbors · Growing Together
屯门妇联山景服务处简介: Established in 1998, we serve children, youth, adults, and the elderly by providing activities and courses suitable for all ages. We are dedicated to building a harmonious community and meeting the physical and mental development needs of residents through diversified services.
屯门山景村山景社区会堂: Shan King Community Hall, Shan King Estate, Tuen Mun
核心服务内容小标题: Providing comprehensive support and development opportunities for residents
多类型的文娱康体活动内容: We provide a variety of recreational and sports activities for children, youth, and families, such as family outings, youth gatherings, day camps, exchange tours, parent-child activities, and free movie screenings. These activities aim to meet the recreational needs of family members, help participants discover interests, and promote physical and mental well-being.
主题讲座及个人发展课程内容: The center organizes various thematic lectures and courses, such as legal talks, moral education lectures, parent enhancement courses, interest groups, and multiple intelligence training for children. These programs benefit different target groups, promote community education, and facilitate personal development.
专业教育培训内容: To encourage residents to add value to themselves and enhance their market competitiveness, the center provides different learning pathways, including retraining courses, talent development courses, professional training, and continuing education programs.
义务工作发展内容: We recruit enthusiastic residents to form a volunteer team. By planning and organizing diversified training activities and social services, we cultivate them into confident and caring individuals who uphold the spirit of volunteerism and give back to society.
